meanings: (용이하다) (be) easy(to deal with), be ready to yield, (be) soft, not firm, easygoing
(우습게 보이다) (be) negligible, slight, be of no account[importance], (be) insignificant
충고와 격려 Life is not that easy.
충고와 격려 Life is no bed of roses.

vlive.korean: 너는 만만한 게 나지? You think I'm that easy, huh? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SPECIAL VIDEO] SEVENTEEN 5th Anniversary '빛나는 5주년(Shining 5th Anniversary)'
vlive.english: You think I'm that easy, huh?

vlive.korean: 만만한 멤버? - 왜 나라 그랬어? 누구야? Easy? - Why did you say it was me? Who said it? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#378. 열려라 에이티즈 (스페셜 DJ AOA 지민&찬미 with 에이티즈)
vlive.english: Easy? - Why did you say it was me? Who said it?

vlive.korean: 여상 친동생 삼고 싶은 만만한 멤버는? Yeo Sang, who's the easiest member you'd like to have as a brother? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#378. 열려라 에이티즈 (스페셜 DJ AOA 지민&찬미 with 에이티즈)
vlive.english: Yeo Sang, who's the easiest member you'd like to have as a brother?

vlive.korean: 그리고 친동생으로 삼고 싶은 만만한 멤버는? - 누굴까? - 누구지? And, the easiest member you'd like to have as a brother is... - Who is it? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#378. 열려라 에이티즈 (스페셜 DJ AOA 지민&찬미 with 에이티즈)
vlive.english: And, the easiest member you'd like to have as a brother is... - Who is it?

vlive.korean: 알고 보면 착하고 만만한 형 창빈! He is nice and generous, though. CHANGBIN! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#177. 사랑의 미로 (w. 스트레이키즈)
vlive.english: He is nice and generous, though. CHANGBIN!

examples.korean: She’s an easy target for their criticisms. 발음듣기 그녀는 그들 비판의 만만한 대상이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s an easy target for their criticisms. 발음

examples.korean: Elderly people are easy prey for dishonest salesmen. 발음듣기 노인들은 부정직한 판매원들의 만만한 피해자가 될 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Elderly people are easy prey for dishonest salesmen. 발음

examples.korean: Unfortunately, my father is no soft touch. 발음듣기 불행히도 우리 아버지는 만만한 분이 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Unfortunately, my father is no soft touch. 발음

examples.korean: I don’t think she’ll agree—she’s no pushover. 발음듣기 난 그녀가 동의할 것 같지 않아. 그녀는 만만한 사람이 아냐. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t think she’ll agree—she’s no pushover. 발음

examples.korean: The Prime Minister was in ebullient mood. 발음듣기 수상은 패기만만한 분위기였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Prime Minister was in ebullient mood. 발음
